TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PageParserFilter extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供頁面剖析器篩選條件的抽象基底類別，ASP.NET 剖析器於剖析階段時會使用此篩選條件來判斷是否允許頁面上的項目。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for a page parser filter that is used by the ASP.NET parser to determine whether an item is allowed in the page at parse time.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何建立衍生自類別類別以管理 ASP.NET 網頁剖析器的行為。The following example demonstrates how you can create a class that derives from the class to govern the behavior of the ASP.NET page parser. `CustomPageParserFilter`是剖析器篩選的明確拒絕頁面中的程式碼。The `CustomPageParserFilter` is a parser filter that explicitly rejects code in the page. 它會透過覆寫屬性。It does this by overriding the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter/CS/CustomPageParserFilter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter/VB/CustomPageParserFilter.vb#2)] 若要使用`CustomPageParserFilter`範例，將此類別放在 App_Code 目錄中。To use the `CustomPageParserFilter` sample, place the class in your App_Code directory. 您必須設定使用中的篩選條件的 ASP.NET 分析`pages`您網站的 Web.config 組態檔區段。You must configure the ASP.NET parsers to use the filter in the `pages` section of your site's Web.config configuration file. 下列範例組態檔顯示之組態`CustomPageParserFilter`。The following example configuration file shows the configuration for `CustomPageParserFilter`. 當設定為使用剖析器的篩選條件，ASP.NET 剖析器擲回例外狀況在建置期間，如果遇到在網頁中的程式碼也一樣。When configured to use a parser filter, the ASP.NET parser throws an exception during the build if it encounters code in a page. `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為類別不會公開定義完善的公用建構函式，它會初始化所使用的頁面分析方法。Because the class does not expose well-defined public constructors, it is initialized by the page parsers that use the method. 覆寫方法，以加入您自己自訂的初始設定步驟的執行個體時是建立及使用 ASP.NET。Override the method to add your own custom initialization steps when an instance of is created and used by ASP.NET. `virtualPath`參數傳遞至方法會設定屬性，且不能是`null`。The `virtualPath` parameter passed to the method sets the property, and cannot be `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以覆寫時實作自訂程式碼建構中所包含的程式碼剖析方法。You can override the method to parse code contained in code constructs when implementing a custom . 在處理之後的程式碼，這個方法會傳回`true`如果剖析器應該處理程式碼，進一步; 否則它會傳回`false`。After processing the code, this method returns `true` if the parser should process the code further; otherwise, it returns `false`. 允許的程式碼建構的類型為列舉值。The type of allowed code constructs are the enumeration values. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 取得頁面剖析器於單頁內允許的直接和間接檔案相依性最大數目。

span.span: Gets the maximum number of direct and indirect file dependencies that the page parser permits for a single page.

value.span: 頁面剖析器於單頁內可剖析的直接和間接檔案相依性最大數目。

span.span: The maximum number of direct and indirect file dependencies the page parser can parse for a page.

value.span: 預設值為 0，表示不允許任何相依性。

span.span: The default is 0, which indicates that no dependencies are allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會追蹤直接數目並設定它會剖析，以及如果的數目超過限制的間接檔案相依性執行個體，就會擲回例外狀況。The class keeps track of the number of direct and indirect file dependencies it parses, and if the number exceeds the limit set by a instance, it throws an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性絕不會是`null`。The property is never `null`.
